message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can sell it to you for $105.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
